com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.sample

Class SLUENetChange

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.sample.SLUENetChange
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.SubscriptionUserExitIF, com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.UserExitIF

    public class SLUENetChange
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.UserExitIF, com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.SubscriptionUserExitIF
    Example of a user exit executing business logic at the transaction level. The business rule for this user exit is that as soon as we see an operation on table 1, we want to have the current source transaction commit and then end the subscription.

      boolean processSubscriptionEvent(com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.SubscriptionEventIF event)
      Receive the subscription level events we are subscribed for return true (do default action for source commit) except for the commit of the final transaction before we end
